TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SpeakStartedEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event. The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event when it begins speaking a prompt using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeakStartedEventArgs> class has no properties, and does not return data from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event. It is provided to enable application authors to write event handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakStarted> event.
